title: Fix missing newlines in streamed output
description: Output from Claude sometimes misses newlines. Investigate the stream parser to ensure newlines are preserved correctly when parsing content_block_delta events. Check if the issue is in how text deltas are concatenated.
closed_reason: Added newline separator between multiple text content blocks in stream parser. When a new text block starts and there's already output content, adds '\n\n' separator to prevent direct concatenation (e.g., multi-turn responses where text->tool->text would concat without spacing). Added tests for multi-turn scenarios and verified thinking->text doesn't add extra separators. Modified internal/agent/stream.go.
